title: Distributed system complexity and operational overhead
description: Moving to microservices introduces significant complexity in operations, monitoring, and debugging. The team has limited experience with distributed systems patterns like circuit breakers, distributed tracing, and service mesh.
mitigation: 1) Invest in comprehensive observability stack (Prometheus, Grafana, Jaeger). 2) Provide team training on distributed systems. 3) Start with 2-3 services before scaling. 4) Implement service mesh (Istio) for traffic management. 5) Establish clear service ownership and on-call rotation.
impact: If not properly managed, could lead to: increased system downtime, difficulty debugging production issues, slower feature development due to coordination overhead, and potential data inconsistencies.
